src:
Chelsea, Tentang Persaingan Internal yang Menular ke Luar
05 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mason Mount menegaskan Chelsea yang sekarang punya modal berharga untuk bersaing meraih trofi di kompetisi mana pun. Dia tahu potensi Chelsea sudah luar biasa dan masih belum jelas sejauh mana mereka bisa berkembang.
Di bawah Frank Lampard, Chelsea menyuguhkan salah satu sepak bola terbaik di Premier League musim ini. Di tengah embargo transfer, pemain-pemain muda Chelsea justru tampil luar biasa, salah satunya Mount.
The Blues sempat menorehkan tujuh kemenangan beruntun di semua kompetisi, sempat terhenti di hadapan Manchester United pada ajang Carabao Cup, lalu segera kembali ke jalur positif usai mengalahkan Watford akhir pekan lalu. Inilah yang membuat Mount yakin.
Setelah kesulitan di beberapa pekan awal, Chelsea perlahan-lahan bangkit, menemukan kepercayaan diri, dan memetik kemenangan penting. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Chelsea, About Internal Competition that Spreads Out
05 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mason Mount insists Chelsea now have valuable capital to compete for trophies in any competition. He knew Chelsea's potential was extraordinary and it was still unclear to what extent they could develop.
Under Frank Lampard, Chelsea presents one of the best football in the Premier League this season. In the midst of the transfer embargo, Chelsea's young players actually appear extraordinary, one of which is Mount.
The Blues had carved seven consecutive wins in all competitions, had stopped before Manchester United at the Carabao Cup, then immediately returned to the positive track after defeating Watford last weekend. This is what makes Mount sure.
After difficulties in the first few weeks, Chelsea slowly rose, found confidence, and reap important victories. Read below, Bolaneters!
